title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. II, pt. 195 - Permits For The Erection And Maintenance Of Signs, Advertising Structures And Devices In The Adirondack And Catskill Parks
content:

§ 195.10 - Repealed

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. II, pt. 195

Statutory authority: Environmental Conservation Law, §9-0305

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
